description.value:
Some oreads feel especially at home in mountainous environments. Oreads with this trait gain a +2 species bonus to @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.3QdtsfnVJsHEdrt0]{Acrobatics} checks to balance across narrow ledges, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.iLlBAZBfHJMZQRQx]{Athletics} checks to climb stony inclines, and Fortitude saves to prevent being fatigued by thin @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.SfkuzH5kxSAmG4nv.JournalEntryPage.NOrSFYXShdxot60k]{Atmospheres} due to altitude (Core Rulebook 397).

This replaces earth affinity.

modifiers.name: Mountain Rapport
modifiers.notes: Some oreads feel especially at home in mountainous environments. Oreads with this trait gain a +2 species bonus to  Acrobatics checks to balance across narrow ledges,  Athletics checks to climb stony inclines, and Fortitude saves to prevent being fatigued by thin  Atmospheres due to altitude (Core Rulebook 397).
